about_the_game:
Bestowed with supernatural powers, you must fight your way through the forces of evil in search of ancient artifacts that may just be the keys to winning a war of biblical proportions

  • Atmospheric Visuals

A heavy, brooding aesthetic helps bring your plight to life, immersing you further into the task you must carry out.

  • Abandoned Surroundings

The cold, lifeless maps are a window into a past long forgotten, taken over by demons, both metaphorically and in the literal sense.

  • Made by an Indie Studio

Developed and Published by one man alone, in hopes of one day becoming a great video game developer, whose works will be played for ages to come.

content_descriptors.notes: This game does feature mild violence, frequent killing, and overall dark and depressing themes, please be advised before playing.

detailed_description:
Bestowed with supernatural powers, you must fight your way through the forces of evil in search of ancient artifacts that may just be the keys to winning a war of biblical proportions

  • Atmospheric Visuals

A heavy, brooding aesthetic helps bring your plight to life, immersing you further into the task you must carry out.

  • Abandoned Surroundings

The cold, lifeless maps are a window into a past long forgotten, taken over by demons, both metaphorically and in the literal sense.

  • Made by an Indie Studio

Developed and Published by one man alone, in hopes of one day becoming a great video game developer, whose works will be played for ages to come.
name: Aether Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-11700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce RTX 2080 Ti
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core I7-14700
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce RTX 3050 Ti
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Aether is a fantasy/horror adventure game in which you play as a man bestowed with great power, tasked with venturing into abandoned buildings full of demonic entities, in hopes of finding ancient artifacts that may very well turn the tide of a war beyond his comprehension.
